abstract: Arizona woman Holly Solomon pleads guilty to two counts of aggravated assault and is sentenced to 3 and a half years in prison for running over her husband Daniel Solomon in her Jeep because he failed to vote in 2012 presidential election.
lead_paragraph: A woman was sentenced to 3 ½ years in prison for running over her husband with the family Jeep because he failed to vote in the 2012 presidential election.

headline.main: Arizona: Wife Sentenced for Vehicular Assault
headline.print_headline: Southwest; Arizona: Wife Sentenced for Vehicular Assault

snippet: A woman was sentenced to 3 ½ years in prison for running over her husband with the family Jeep because he failed to vote in the 2012 presidential election.
